name: @calvear/rsuite-styles
title: Custom React Suite stylesheet
description: Custom React Suite styles for eases base styles and fonts injection.
author: Alvear Candia, Cristopher Alejandro <calvear93@gmail.com>

scripts.build: lessc --js src/light.less dist/light.css && lessc --js src/dark.less dist/dark.css
scripts.upload: npm run build && npm login && npm publish --access public
scripts.upload:beta: npm run build && npm login && npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.upload:alpha: npm run build && npm login && npm publish --access public --tag alpha
